1.text: Purchase a whole chicken or chicken pieces.

2.text:
Wash the chicken under cold water (optional, as it likely just spreads bacteria),[1]
X
Research source



 dry it, and season it.

4.text: Remove the chicken from the broth or water.

5.text: Pull the meat from the chicken bones.

6.text: Place the shredded chicken in a bowl to be used in your favorite recipe.

7.text: Store shredded chicken in an airtight bag or Tupperware.

9.text: Make your shredded chicken into chicken salad.

10.text: Warm the belly and the heart with homemade chicken noodle soup.
